page.title: 17A TYPICAL FAMILY
page.content: The Rust_Andrews family consists of a mother, father and four children who are all boys. David, who is the father, is the local carpenter/builder and his work varies from building houses to general repairs. When he has spare time he enjoys swimming. Gloria, the mother, spends most of her time looking after the family and home. She is a member of the W.I. and does sidesman duties at the local church. She is also a partner in the family business. John is the eldest of the boys, he is 14 and enjoys music playing the piano, violin and clarinet. Julian is next, he is 13 and enjoys outdoor activities and sport. He is a member of the local youth football team. The two youngest children are Justin who is 7 and James who is 5.
